review_data.title: Excellent Hotel

review_data.title: Sehr gut

review_data.title: visit to zurich for sightseeing

review_data.title: Poor customer relations until you point out their problems and lack of standards.

review_data.title: Spot on for the business traveller

review_data.title: Always awesome
review_data.content: Great breakfast buffet and restaurant. Restaurant is open late, has numerous televisions, and has a separate, more quiet dining room if you want more romantic or a quiet dinner with the family.

review_data.title: Value for Money Hotel
review_data.content: Have stayed at Crown Plaza couple of times during the visit. Though it is bit away from town center, it is value for money. Connectivity to town center is reasonably good and there many affordable dining options available nearby.

review_data.title: Showing its age

review_data.title: Wow

review_data.title: Great service

review_data.title: Nice Hotel

review_data.title: IHGリワードプログラムで宿泊。駅から遠い。
review_data.content: チューリヒ中央駅からトラム2か3を乗り継いで行きます。チューリヒ中央駅から遠いですが、ステイは快適でした。リワードプログラムでの宿泊だったので無料で最上階のスイートへアップグレード、部屋にはウェルカムフルーツやチョコレート、コーヒメーカーありました。スタッフは感じが良く親切でフリードリンクとフリーの前菜はバーで頂けました。アメニティも充実しており、シャンプー、シャワージェル、カミソリ、歯ブラシなどちゃんと揃っていました。行き方はこんな感じです。トラム3番でAlbisriederplatzまで行ったら、そこから6分程度歩いて着きます。From the airport you can take the train to the main station Zurich HB.From the main station: Take the tram number 3 (direction Albisrieden) until Albisriederplatz.Go further on the Badenerstrasse and follow the tram line 2, after 200m you find the Crowne Plaza Zurich on...More

review_data.title: excellent value for money, great bed, tastful breakfast

review_data.title: Brilliant!

review_data.title: Nice but expensive

review_data.title: A little expensive

review_data.title: Decent hotel
review_data.content: I stay there for business, the hotel is reasonable, and clean. I like the soaps, chocolates and the sleep kit they have in the rooms.

review_data.title: nice people, and good food

review_data.title: Good family hotel
